page.title: 12HEALTH WOLSTANTON
page.content: The Porthill Clinic was built about 20years ago.It has recently been extended for the new district nurses. There is one doctor who comes twice a week to look after children from birth to 5years old.The clinic has been in operation for 20years.They have about 233 patients a week.There are 6 people full time and 4 new district nurses coming.The health visitor gives a lecture a month to parents.Doctor M. Fisher has worked there the longest.All the staff enjoy working there.More mothers are coming to have their babies injected for measles.About 5 out of every 100 babies are very overweight and very few are underweight.5 out of 10 approximately are premature babies.
